notes: common time noun; often used with preposition 'a'
used occasionally as an indefinite count noun
example_sentence_italian: Non ricordo una mezzanotte così calma.
example_sentence_english: I do not remember a midnight so calm.
Listen to the clock: it is midnight.
I will not forget those midnights.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono state delle mezzanotti speciali.
Della mezzanotte ricordo solo il silenzio.
example_sentence_english: I remember only the silence of midnight.
The meeting will end at midnight.
Since midnight I have not slept.

example_sentence_italian: Nella mezzanotte la città è silenziosa.
example_sentence_english: At midnight the city is quiet.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un racconto sulla mezzanotte.
example_sentence_english: I read a story about midnight.

example_sentence_italian: Sono tornato con la mezzanotte vicina.

example_sentence_english: I thought about the midnights of summer.
I wrote about the past midnights.

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo cantato con le mezzanotti in mente.
example_sentence_english: We sang with midnights in mind.
